articles.content: For her glam makeup, Janhvi opted for winged eyeliner, shimmery eye shadow, smokey eyes, feathered brows, rouge on the cheekbones, beaming highlighter, mascara on the lashes and a shade of mauve lips… [+4 chars]

articles.title: Ashneer Grover Forces Comic To Drop Roast Video, Faces Social Media Heat - NDTV
articles.description: Shark Tank famed Ashneer Grover, who gained popularity for his outspoken and candid conduct on the show, has once again landed in a controversy for allegedly asking a comedian to take down a roast show he was a part of.
articles.content:
